tweets.tweet_raw: Happy birthday to my right hand man, my left hand man just plain old main man Vic Johnson. Big walked into my studio in 1996. Happy 24th anniversary to Sammy's 1st post-Van Halen solo album, 'Marching To Mars'! In a '97 interview with Vogelism Sammy said "I have exposed a lot more of myself, the true Sammy Hagar. Marching To Mars, in my opinion, is the closest to who I really am"
https://t.co/wJg7keFWuI https://t.co/PDccHpKr4t
